contentData.data: Enter your phone number? ------ SENMONEY MENU ------ Enter the number of the chosen service 1: Balance of my account 2: Money transfer 3: Bill payment 4: Options 1: Transfer to another number 2: Others Enter the phone number that should receive the money transfer: Please enter the amount you wish to transfer (in FCFA) Enter your security code? your account balance is 10,000 Do you want to return to the menu? The user wants to cancel the program! Please choose : 1: Balance of my accounts 2: Last five transactions 3: Modification of the secret code 4: Status Consultation To receive the balance of your Sen Money account by SMS, please enter your secret code: To receive your last 5 Sen Money transactions by SMS, please enter your secret code. You will change your Sen Money secret code, please enter your current secret code Your Sen Money status does not allow you to make transactions nof more than 200,000F. To increase it to 2,000,000, go to the SM point or SM Kiosk with your ID.
